name: Just Wait
description:
Overview

This is a little arcade game all about timing. Your goal is to position and then launch the white orb on the outermost ring into the goal at the center! The colorful, rotating walls will collide with the orb, so waiting for the perfect opening is essential.

Fullscreen mode is highly recommended!

How to Play

Left/right arrow keys (or A/D keys) - Move the orb clockwise/counterclockwise

Spacebar/Enter - Launch the orb towards the center

The lightning bolt icon in the bottom-left corner opens a menu where you can acquire upgrades using points you've earned besting levels in the game.
